sentence.Network_en: A casement is a window that opens by means of hinges at the side.
sentence.Network_cn: 竖铰链窗是一种用边上的铰链开启的窗户.

sentence.Network_en: This paper introduces the TIG _ welding technology of repairing stainless steel casement.

sentence.Network_en: Late at night, through the moonlight into the casement, and a Caesar.
sentence.Network_cn: 夜深了, 月光透进了窗扉, 撒了一地.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an architectural term denoting a hollow moulding): from Anglo-Latin cassimentum, from cassa, from Latin capsa (see case)

entry.tran: 竖铰链窗;平开窗；门式窗
entry.def: A casement or a casement window is a window that opens by means of hinges, usually at the side.

means.word_mean: 1. a window shash that is hinged (usually on one side)
